snippet: “Rooms of Wonder: From Wunderkammer to Museum, 1599-1899,” at the Grolier Club, shows how a thirst for knowledge fed the desire to house and display prized collections.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews Rooms of Wonder: From Wunderkammer to Museum, 1599-1899,  exhibition of illustrated rare books and ephemera at Grolier Club in Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: “Rooms of Wonder: From Wunderkammer to Museum, 1599-1899,” at the Grolier Club, shows how a thirst for knowledge fed the desire to house and display prized collections.

headline.seo: ‘Rooms of Wonder’ at the Grolier Club
headline.main: A Place to Put All Those Curiosities
headline.print_headline: A Place to Put All Those Curiosities
